articles.title: Americans divided over what US stands for on this July Fourth - CNN
articles.description: Rarely have Americans been so divided on what their country stands for as on the 246th anniversary of independence.
articles.content:

articles.title: Robert Irwin ‘dating American actress Emmy Perry’ - PerthNow
articles.description: The two have been linked for a number of years, but the US actress recently visited the country, spending time at Australia Zoo with Irwin.
articles.content:
Robert Irwin may be off the market.
It seems he is dating long-time friend, actress Emmy Perry, according to reports in Womans Day.

articles.author: Carla K. Johnson
articles.title: For now, wary US treads water with transformed COVID-19 - The Associated Press - en Español
articles.description: The fast-changing coronavirus has kicked off summer in the U.S. with lots of infections but relatively few deaths compared to its prior incarnations. COVID-19 is still killing hundreds of Americans each day, but is not nearly as dangerous as it was last fall …
